divs: sighting detailsa ball\sphere of white light travelled north to south across the sky. it stopped to 'hover' then took off at right angles(90*). while hovering it was brighter than any of the stars. after hovering for about 8 seconds it quickly disappeared going east. there was a helicopter in the air on the other side of the sky, you could see its blinking lights and hear the 'whoop-whoop' of its blades. the light mad absolutely no sound at all. i would say its altitude was between 500 & 800 ft. there were no blinking lights, just a steady white uniform light. when moving it travelled faster than any plane i have ever seen. i spent 8 years in the us army and have seen many aircraft (helicopters, fighters, reconn, tankers, commercial). none of these types of planes could have made the combined: speed, direction change, noise free at close range, lack of any blinking lights. thanks marks
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering

Summary: white ball of light travelling extremely fast and low raced across the sky and did a 90 degree turn.
